availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Tabitha Christian Bell Clements (Union County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of Kinchen Bell and Susanna Bell. Married to Joseph Leonard Clements in Union County on September 11, 1858. Mother of Jake Clements. Resident in Union County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 478A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 598.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film #000562203, p. 128.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994056, Union County Births/Marriages/Deaths, p. 221.
